    CryptoKeyGenerator() - Constructor for class io.fusion.air.microservice.security.CryptoKeyGenerator
    Instantiate Generate Crypto Keys CryptoKeyGenerator cryptoKeys = new CryptoKeyGenerator() .setKeyFiles(publicKeyFileName, privateKeyFileName) .iFPublicPrivateKeyFileNotFound().THEN() .createRSAKeyFiles() .ELSE() .readRSAKeyFiles() .build();
